cards.flavor_text: "May your wretched name never grace the annals of history, you ignorant buffoon!"

cards.name: Umbral Juke
cards.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
• Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
cards.flavor_text: The sport of Mage Tower was conceived as a playful testing ground for young spellcasters.

cards.name: Uvilda, Dean of Perfection // Nassari, Dean of Expression
cards.type_line: Legendary Creature — Djinn Wizard // Legendary Creature — Efreet Shaman

card_faces.name: Uvilda, Dean of Perfection
card_faces.oracle_text: {T}: You may exile an instant or sorcery card from your hand and put three hone counters on it. It gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this card is exiled, remove a hone counter from it" and "When the last hone counter is removed from this card, if it's exiled, you may cast it. It costs {4} less to cast this way."

card_faces.name: Nassari, Dean of Expression
card_faces.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of each opponent's library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on Nassari, Dean of Expression.

cards.name: Venerable Warsinger
cards.oracle_text:
Vigilance, trample
Whenever Venerable Warsinger deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of damage Venerable Warsinger dealt to that player.

cards.name: Vortex Runner
cards.oracle_text: As long as you control eight or more lands, Vortex Runner gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.
cards.flavor_text: "By using the vortex, I can study for at least fifteen extra minutes between every class. I wasn't being reckless, Dean Imbraham. I was being efficient."

cards.name: Accomplished Alchemist
cards.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
cards.flavor_text: "Tincture of murkroot and lizard feet? Simple. One that doesn't take like murkroot and lizard feet? I'm working on it."

cards.name: Archmage Emeritus
cards.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: Some emeritus professors return from their wanderings periodically to share tales of the mystical wonders of Arcavios.

cards.name: Baleful Mastery
cards.oracle_text:
You may pay {1}{B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {1}{B} cost was paid, an opponent draws a card.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.

cards.name: Biblioplex Assistant
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When Biblioplex Assistant enters the battlefield, put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.
cards.flavor_text:
"I appreciate the help, and honestly, it's very entertaining."
—Isabough of the Biblioplex

cards.name: Blade Historian
cards.oracle_text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.
cards.flavor_text: "So you see, the reckless battle strategy of the Kathorran orcs was effective, but ultimately proved to be a double-edged sword. As did their double-edged swords."

cards.name: Combat Professor
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: "Before Yovus was cut down at Pranticle Peak, she performed which maneuver? Anyone? From the reading?"

cards.name: Crushing Disappointment
cards.oracle_text: Each player loses 2 life. You draw two cards.
cards.flavor_text: Most students could barely endure Dean Embrose's scrutiny for a semester or two; Killian lived with it his entire life.

cards.name: Culling Ritual
cards.oracle_text: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. Add {B} or {G} for each permanent destroyed this way.
cards.flavor_text: "Your own frailty is your undoing. I am merely the one to expose it."

cards.name: Daemogoth Titan
cards.oracle_text: Whenever Daemogoth Titan attacks or blocks, sacrifice a creature.
cards.flavor_text:
"Of course it offered you power. Demons always do. But trust me—the sweeter the prize, the more ruinous the price."
—Professor Onyx

cards.name: Daemogoth Woe-Eater
cards.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
When you sacrifice Daemogoth Woe-Eater, each opponent discards a card, you draw a card, and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: "Your pain for my wisdom. You'll get no better deal."

cards.name: Defend the Campus
cards.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor_text: Professors scrambled to push the mage hunters back, leaving the heart of Strixhaven undefended.

cards.name: Draconic Intervention
cards.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
Draconic Intervention deals X damage to each non-Dragon creature, where X is the exiled card's mana value. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Exile Draconic Intervention.

cards.name: Dramatic Finale
cards.oracle_text:
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control die, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.
cards.flavor_text: The enraptured audience barely noticed their programs were suddenly blank.

cards.name: Dueling Coach
cards.oracle_text:
When Dueling Coach enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
{4}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Efreet Flamepainter
cards.oracle_text:
Double strike
Whenever Efreet Flamepainter deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

cards.name: Elemental Expressionist
cards.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, choose target creature you control. Until end of turn, it gains "If this creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else" and "When this creature is put into exile, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token." (Each instance of that ability triggers separately.)

cards.name: Eureka Moment
cards.oracle_text: Draw two cards. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text: "At first, the equations were simply numbers. But in those numbers, I saw a story, and in that story I saw a pattern, and suddenly it all fit together!"

cards.name: Exhilarating Elocution
cards.oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: His words poured forth on waves of golden light, scouring all fear from his audience's hearts and minds.

cards.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord // Awaken the Blood Avatar

card_faces.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord
card_faces.oracle_text:
Double strike
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Join me for the dawn of a new age."

card_faces.name: Awaken the Blood Avatar
card_faces.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed this way.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. Create a 3/6 black and red Avatar creature token with haste and "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 3 damage to each opponent."

all_parts.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord // Awaken the Blood Avatar

cards.name: Fuming Effigy
cards.oracle_text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, Fuming Effigy deals 1 damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor_text: Some spirits share ancient wisdom. Others just get mad you touched their stuff.

cards.name: Galazeth Prismari
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When Galazeth Prismari enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.
Artifacts you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell."

cards.name: Gnarled Professor
cards.oracle_text:
Trample
When Gnarled Professor enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
cards.flavor_text: "Class is in season."

cards.name: Illuminate History
cards.oracle_text: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. Then if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
cards.flavor_text: "Look at the detail in this stonework! Professor, our assumptions about early Kathorran tool use may not be correct."

cards.name: Maelstrom Muse
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Maelstrom Muse attacks, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is Maelstrom Muse's power as this ability resolves.
cards.flavor_text: She's an inspiration to everyone, even herself.

cards.name: Mage Hunter
cards.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts or copies an instant or sorcery spell, they lose 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: One of the Oriq's most powerful tools is the mage hunter, a vile monstrosity created to seek out and snuff out the arcane.

cards.name: Mage Hunters' Onslaught
cards.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Whenever a creature blocks this turn, its controller loses 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: Extus stood before his alma mater for a moment, remembering first his studies, then his vengeance. At his command, the mage hunters unfolded.

cards.name: Manifestation Sage
cards.oracle_text: When Manifestation Sage enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
cards.flavor_text: The first thing a Quandrix mage learns is the laws of metaphysics. The second thing is how to break them.

cards.name: Mascot Interception
cards.oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature token.
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: Far from the trappings of royalty, Rowan and Will found inspiration from the most popular sport on campus, Mage Tower.

cards.name: Master Symmetrist
cards.oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever a creature you control with power equal to its toughness attacks, it gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: Tondo lost his very first duel and has spent his entire life trying to get even.

cards.name: Moldering Karok
cards.oracle_text: Trample, lifelink
cards.flavor_text: Necroluminescence is common among the undead creatures of Sedgemoor, giving the midnight swamp an eerie glow. It's comforting—from a distance.

cards.name: Mortality Spear
cards.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you gained life this turn.
Destroy target nonland permanent.
cards.flavor_text: "Death is my life's work."

cards.name: Novice Dissector
cards.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: "The professor said to first extract the venom glands, then the acid sac. Next up, the . . . meeping organ?"

cards.name: Oriq Loremage
cards.oracle_text: {T}: Search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. If it's an instant or sorcery card, put a +1/+1 counter on Oriq Loremage.
cards.flavor_text: Nothing can quell the Oriq's thirst for the forbidden secrets of the past.

cards.name: Pillardrop Warden
cards.oracle_text:
Reach
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pillardrop Warden: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: A giant statue of a dwarf is still a giant statue.

cards.name: Professor of Zoomancy
cards.oracle_text: When Professor of Zoomancy enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
cards.flavor_text: She's brilliant, if a bit overbearing.

cards.name: Quandrix Cultivator
cards.oracle_text: When Quandrix Cultivator enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
cards.flavor_text: In the gardens spread across the Quandrix campus, fern turns to forest before class is even over.

cards.name: Radiant Scrollwielder
cards.oracle_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink.
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard. You may cast it this turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

cards.name: Reconstruct History
cards.oracle_text:
Return up to one target artifact card, up to one target enchantment card, up to one target instant card, up to one target sorcery card, and up to one target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.
Exile Reconstruct History.

cards.name: Retriever Phoenix
cards.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
When Retriever Phoenix enters the battlefield, if you cast it, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
As long as Retriever Phoenix is in your graveyard, if you would learn, you may instead return Retriever Phoenix to the battlefield.

cards.name: Semester's End
cards.oracle_text: Exile any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers you control. At the beginning of the next end step, return each of them to the battlefield under its owner's control. Each of them enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature and an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker.

cards.name: Serpentine Curve
cards.oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is one plus the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text:
"Math bites."
—Bim, Lorehold mage-student

cards.name: Silverquill Command
cards.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
• Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Target player draws a card and loses 1 life.
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.name: Specter of the Fens
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
{5}{B}: Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: Foul specters hunt down those who try to back out of a deal with a daemogoth.

cards.name: Spiteful Squad
cards.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Spiteful Squad enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
When Spiteful Squad dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
cards.flavor_text: "Don't you know first-years pay a toll to walk through here?"

cards.name: Storm-Kiln Artist
cards.oracle_text:
Storm-Kiln Artist gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a Treasure token.
cards.flavor_text: A captured elemental makes for a potent, albeit unstable, power source.

cards.name: Tempted by the Oriq
cards.oracle_text: For each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature or planeswalker that player controls with mana value 3 or less.
cards.flavor_text: To exact his vengeance, Extus needed followers. His infiltrators recruited promising mage-students from the very halls he sought to destroy.

card_faces.name: Torrent Sculptor
card_faces.oracle_text:
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
When Torrent Sculptor enters the battlefield, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on Torrent Sculptor equal to half that card's mana value, rounded up.

card_faces.name: Flamethrower Sonata
card_faces.oracle_text: Discard a card, then draw a card. When you discard an instant or sorcery card this way, Flamethrower Sonata deals damage equal to that card's mana value to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
card_faces.flavor_text: He channels his heart's passion into every fiery note.

cards.name: Waterfall Aerialist
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
cards.flavor_text: Form and function in perfect unity.

cards.name: Aether Helix
cards.oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: Some Quandrix mages prefer to study at twilight, watching their experimental equations trace glowing trails against the encroaching darkness.

cards.name: Ardent Dustspeaker
cards.oracle_text: Whenever Ardent Dustspeaker attacks, you may put an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. If you do, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards this turn.
cards.flavor_text: "The Founder Dragons weren't even hatched when this scroll was written!"

cards.name: Bury in Books
cards.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets an attacking creature.
Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.
cards.flavor_text: There are no weapons allowed in the Biblioplex, but a clever mage is never truly defenseless.

cards.name: Closing Statement
cards.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast during your end step.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker you don't control. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
cards.flavor_text: "In conclusion . . ."

cards.name: Elemental Summoning
cards.oracle_text: Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
cards.flavor_text:
"You've made a splash. Now show me a torrent."
—Uvilda, Prismari dean

cards.name: Fervent Mastery
cards.oracle_text:
You may pay {2}{R}{R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{R}{R} cost was paid, an opponent discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.
Search your library for up to three cards, put them into your hand, shuffle, then discard three cards at random.

cards.name: Hofri Ghostforge
cards.oracle_text:
Spirits you control get +1/+1 and have trample and haste.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's graveyard."

cards.name: Introduction to Annihilation
cards.oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller draws a card.
cards.flavor_text:
"I've never seen a student fail quite so spectacularly. There's potential in that."
—Hostram, professor of arcanochemistry

cards.name: Karok Wrangler
cards.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
cards.flavor_text:
"She showed up to class on a what?"
—Valentin, Witherbloom Dean

cards.name: Lorehold Command
cards.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
• Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible and haste until end of turn.
• Lorehold Command deals 3 damage to any target. Target player gains 3 life.
• Sacrifice a permanent, then draw two cards.

cards.name: Oggyar Battle-Seer
cards.oracle_text:
Haste
{T}: Scry 1.
cards.flavor_text: "May Ganathog bless us with bloody visions of glory restored!"

cards.name: Owlin Shieldmage
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Ward—Pay 3 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)
cards.flavor_text: "Aim higher next time."

cards.name: Pigment Storm
cards.oracle_text: Pigment Storm deals 5 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
cards.flavor_text: When art projects collapse, Prismari students revel in the beauty of destruction. Everyone else runs for cover.

cards.name: Pillardrop Rescuer
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When Pillardrop Rescuer enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: Gentle hands of stone whisk the careless from the crumbling ruins of Pillardrop.

cards.name: Practical Research
cards.oracle_text: Draw four cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an instant or sorcery card.
cards.flavor_text: The twins each researched spells to defeat Extus in their own way. Will hit the library. Rowan hit everything else.

cards.name: Quintorius, Field Historian
cards.oracle_text:
Spirits you control get +1/+0.
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
cards.flavor_text: "Every life has a story to tell. I won't let them be forgotten."

cards.name: Relic Sloth
cards.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
cards.flavor_text: When it comes to transporting priceless, delicate artifacts, safety is more important than speed.

cards.name: Shadrix Silverquill
cards.oracle_text:
Flying, double strike
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may choose two. Each mode must target a different player.
• Target player creates a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
• Target player draws a card and loses 1 life.
• Target player puts a +1/+1 counter on each creature they control.

cards.name: Tanazir Quandrix
cards.oracle_text:
Flying, trample
When Tanazir Quandrix enters the battlefield, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
Whenever Tanazir Quandrix attacks, you may have the base power and toughness of other creatures you control become equal to Tanazir Quandrix's power and toughness until end of turn.

cards.name: Tenured Inkcaster
cards.oracle_text:
When Tenured Inkcaster enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: "Ah, another future archmage for my collection."

card_faces.name: Wandering Archaic
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, they may pay {2}. If they don't, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card_faces.name: Explore the Vastlands
card_faces.oracle_text: Each player looks at the top five cards of their library and may reveal a land card and/or an instant or sorcery card from among them. Each player puts the cards they revealed this way into their hand and the rest on the bottom of their library in a random order. Each player gains 3 life.

cards.name: Witherbloom Pledgemage
cards.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: "Death is just a transfer of energy. Those pests I harvested have the honor of becoming pure magic. What could be more beautiful?"

cards.name: Wormhole Serpent
cards.oracle_text: {3}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor_text: After drownings, devourings, and one highly unpleasant algae infestation, unsupervised portal use on campus was banned.

cards.name: Body of Research
cards.oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your library.
cards.flavor_text: Needledeep had promised that his final project would be his biggest one yet.

cards.name: Cogwork Archivist
cards.oracle_text:
Reach
{2}, {T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
cards.flavor_text:
"It's the largest library in the Multiverse. Of course it has the largest librarians."
—Kasmina

cards.name: Devastating Mastery
cards.oracle_text:
You may pay {2}{W}{W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{W}{W} cost was paid, an opponent chooses up to two nonland permanents they control and returns them to their owner's hand.
Destroy all nonland permanents.

cards.name: Leyline Invocation
cards.oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of lands you control.
cards.flavor_text:
"Do you still believe my work is nothing but dry, boring equations?"
—Cairu, Quandrix mage-student

cards.name: Professor Onyx
cards.oracle_text:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
+1: You lose 1 life. Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
−3: Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls.
−8: Each opponent may discard a card. If they don't, they lose 3 life. Repeat this process six more times.

cards.name: Returned Pastcaller
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When Returned Pastcaller enters the battlefield, return target Spirit, instant, or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: Lorehold spirit statues are not forbidden from raising statues of their own.

cards.name: Rise of Extus
cards.oracle_text:
Exile target creature. Exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
cards.flavor_text: With one lethal strike, Extus took control of the Oriq and took his first step towards vengeance.

cards.name: Snow Day
cards.oracle_text:
Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
cards.flavor_text:
"Advanced Elemental Manifestations is canceled until all students have thawed."
—Prismari dormitory notice

cards.name: Verdant Mastery
cards.oracle_text:
You may pay {3}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Search your library for up to four basic land cards and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped under an opponent's control if the {3}{G} cost was paid. Put two of them onto the battlefield tapped under your control and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

cards.name: Beledros Witherbloom
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
Pay 10 life: Untap all lands you control. Activate only once each turn.

cards.name: Creative Outburst
cards.oracle_text:
Creative Outburst deals 5 damage to any target. Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Creative Outburst: Create a Treasure token.

cards.name: Elemental Masterpiece
cards.oracle_text:
Create two 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature tokens.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Elemental Masterpiece: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
cards.flavor_text: Rootha passed with flying, living colors.

cards.name: Harness Infinity
cards.oracle_text:
Exchange your hand and graveyard.
Exile Harness Infinity.
cards.flavor_text:
"As I stepped into the star arch, it all became perfectly clear. Life and death are not opposites, but an endless path, twisting around and back upon itself, never ending and never beginning."
—Zhaer, professor of biophilosophy

cards.name: Mascot Exhibition
cards.oracle_text: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying, a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token, and a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
cards.flavor_text:
"Don't just win the game. Win the crowd."
—Moriana, Mage Tower coach

cards.name: Velomachus Lorehold
cards.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
Whenever Velomachus Lorehold attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to Velomachus Lorehold's power from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Bookwurm
cards.oracle_text:

Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it by paying {1} rather than paying its mana cost. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield.
